title: Create a New PM Plan
description: A new piece of equipment has been installed and a reliability engineer needs to create its preventive maintenance plan from scratch.

tasks.description: Create a new asset record for the equipment in the CMMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the new asset record.

tasks.description: Define the individual PM tasks based on the OEM's recommendations (e.g., 'Inspect monthly', 'Replace filter quarterly').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates several new PM tasks with different frequencies.

tasks.description: Build the maintenance plan by associating the PM tasks with the new asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the full PM plan, and the system generates the first set of due dates.
